Message:
When I came to,
everything around me
was in shambles,
like someone had
gone on a rampage...

I put my happy mask on to
cover myself up from anyone
who’d look at me in fear.

“Maximum smileage.
Happiness is in full bloom.
Smiles are happy magic.”

I chanted those magic words
again and again.
she—I can rest a bit easier.

We aren’t alone.
We’re witches,
but we’re in this together.
